= Shortcuts = 
* use control space to get snippets
sysout  Ctrl+space  => System.out.println();
syserr
Command+Click - jump to definition 
Ctrl + Shift + F  - format
F3 open declaration
Ctrl-Alt-Down: copies current line or selected lines to below
Ctrl-Alt-Up:: copies current line or selected lines to above
Ctrl-Shift-L: brings up a List of shortcut keys
*
Command-Shift-O:  add #import statement
*
Command+D -  delete the line
Command-Option-Arrow: copy line
